other_tests.procedure_name: CT Abdomen and Pelvis with Contrast
other_tests.findings: Subsegmental bilateral lower lobe dependent atelectasis, mild right middle lobe atelectasis, mild to moderate cardiac enlargement, trace pericardial effusion, mild central intrahepatic biliary duct dilatation, 1.9 x 1.4 cm left adrenal nodule, 1.8 x 1.5 cm right adrenal lesion, extensive wall thickening throughout sigmoid colon with surrounding vascular injection and fat stranding, 4.4 x 2.5 x 4.1 cm perisigmoid fluid collection concerning for abscess, small quantity of free fluid within lower abdomen.
WBC of 9.3 (PMN 73.6), H/H of 10.7/33.4, Creatinine 0.9, ALT 27, AST 59, AP 58, Tbili 0.6, Albumin 3.5, Lactate 1.3. Significant findings include 'NO GROWTH.'
